    • Uses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.netNeuron

      Subclasses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.netNeuron 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetBackNeuron<I>
      A net back neuron is a neuron that can be connected from net front neurons on: -the same process -other processes on the same machine -processes on other machines A net back neuron is closable.
      class  NetFrontNeuron<O>
      A net front neuron is a neuron that connects to a net back neuron.

      class  Neuron<IO>
      A neuron has an output function that can be set programmatically.

      class  Neuronoid<N extends Neuronoid<N,I,O>,I,O>
      This class represents a neuron.
      Subclasses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.neuronoid 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BundleNeuron<O>
      A bundle neuron is a neuron whose output is a container of its inputs.
      class  FanoutNeuron<O>
      A fanout neuron is a neuron that: -Has a container of elements as input.
      class  SourceNeuron<O>
      A source neuron is a neuron that provides a source.
      class  TransformNeuron<I,O>
      A transform neuron is a neuron that transform an input to an output.
